lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I have been richly blessed and would like to use my resources to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students about biology.

lender.name: Stella
lender.loan_because: I believe that change starts with individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hospital.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and it takes so little to help.

lender.name: Susan & Russ
lender.loan_because: We believe that capitolism is the path to prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Owner and operator of a school and a small factory.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to make a differance.
lender.occupational_info: 25 years of municipal government public works. Volunteer for 10 years on provincial and national professional councils.

lender.name: Charles McKeever
lender.loan_because:
1) I believe we are entrusted with resources so that we can demonstrate good stewardship while showing love to those in need.
2) People deserve the opportunity to support themselves and to improve the lives of the people around them.
3) These entrepreneurs are an encouragement to me and a reminder that we are always blessed, even when we think we have little.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who want to create their own business that adds value to their lives and the lives of others.

lender.name: elvedina
lender.occupational_info: i wont to make my private kinder garden\r\nbecause in my land there is not enough\r\nthis kind of institution

lender.name: Gakena
lender.loan_because: I want to help others get out of poverty, having first-hand experience of what poverty is. I know from experience that poor people have talents and skills, but lack of initials funds limits their potential.
lender.occupational_info: As an employee, I am a research assistant/technician for surgical instrument processing and sterilization. As an entrepreneur, I work on projects for small to medium businesses.

lender.name: Ginka
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Hazel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have been in need before and was helped by friends. I want to give others a chance to help themselves.

lender.name: Nic & Maurine
lender.loan_because: It's just and it works
lender.occupational_info: We do community development & primary healthcare among the poor here.

lender.name: damilola
lender.loan_because: i want to build my own personal school and to make it good for children.
lender.occupational_info: well,my work is not easy to say,but i just did it because of my love for children.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I lived in Tanzania for two years as a Peace Corps Volunteer. The way I see it, small loans are sustainable and highly effective way of helping entrepreneurs grow their small enterprises. Thriving enterprises stabilize economies and are a way of effecting lasting change that permeates all aspects of life and lends hope for a brighter future.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Nairobi for an international NGO that specializes in agricultural enterprise development (i.e. rural retailers of agricultural inputs) as a means of increasing smallholder farmers' access to agricultural inputs.

lender.name: julia
lender.loan_because: I am 30 years old, and I want to start, my own business as shoe designer, and go ahead with my own mark
lender.occupational_info: i design the shoe models first, then i send the draft to the manufacturer, as soon as the first model is ready then I oked, for final production. I focus in women models.

lender.name: Clifford & Chantal
lender.loan_because: I saw a program on CBC about this organization and we disided to loan twice a month.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for Manitoba Hydro and live in Gillam north of the 56th parallel.I work as gate control my hubby he delivers the mail to all the stations

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: Life is incredibly easy in the United States. If I can make even the slightest difference in changing someone else\'s life than that makes these loans completely worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I will be completing high school this spring and will enter college seeking either a nursing program or possibly an engineering degree.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I feel we need to share our resources with those who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Wellness centre with traditional and natural medications.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: $25.00 hardly makes a difference here in the States, but my loans through Kiva actually help improve someone's life, including my own.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: it seems like a great way to help people help themselves, not creating dependency or giving a handout, but letting them work towards what they want without the same feeling of indebtedness.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I'm working with high-risk youth, but hope one day to be working in development and international relations using renewable energy engineering.

lender.name: Dea
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to be in the position of helping people.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children. My husband provides for us.

lender.name: Shannon Ryan
lender.loan_because: as someone who started their own business 15 years ago, I know the value - and the importance - of a little bit of captial.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO of an IT company

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: The United States in the richest country in the world, and we Americans are extraordinarily lucky to be U.S. citizens. We should help others who are less fortunate, and there is no better way to do so than directly to help entrepreneurs with little or no access to capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am a political scientist, academic administrator, and university professor.

lender.name: Michelle,Brian & boys
lender.loan_because: we like to contribute to families to empower themselves.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: The trickle down system only works if we become leaks in the pipe.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at an art school and provide general psychological services to private clients.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to run a restaurant and how to eat healthy.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: I believe with a little money and encouragement most people want to help themselves succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now. I worked as a social worker in a clinic which served all ages of people who had hearing problems as well as speech and language problems. I also worked as a social worker in our local school system and also worked as a teacher/vice principal.My primary responsibilities have always included finding ways for disadvantaged person to become independent.

lender.name: Alain Portmann
lender.loan_because: Money is needed to make money. Funding through micro loans is essential to provide working capital and begin to redistribute resources.
lender.occupational_info: Advertising. Ideas. Marketing.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: sums of money that are small in the US can go a lot farther in other places.
lender.occupational_info: i work at an after-school program

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m in grade 6.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a great thing to do with some extra money. It is like sharing a bit of the American Dream outside of America and helping to show Americans are not that bad.
lender.occupational_info: My job as an I.C.S.(Inventory Control Specialist) Associate is to make sure the shelves are stocked both on the sales floor and in the back room.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to support our fellow women & men around the world.

lender.name: Jim and Sheri
lender.loan_because: the world will be better with everybody having a better standard of living. Kiva is one way I can help.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupational_info: Helping business organizations improve their operations and results.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Fast

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: My daughter, Ronalee Allen was killed in a head on collision May 30/08. She left a husband and 5 children, the baby only 13 months old. She fostered over 150 children. Her life was all about helping others and I want to honor her by continuing to help the less fortunate. We are also raising funds to build an orphanage in Kitale, Kenya in her honor.
lender.occupational_info: Retired.

lender.name: Harbor
lender.loan_because: We are a group of women physicians in Southern California interested in helping other women support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We provide medical care to women and underserved patients.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I have seen the very real difference that small loans can make in the lives of hard-working people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language, and try to bring training, resources, and opportunities to my adoptive community.

lender.name: McKay Family
lender.loan_because: We love helping people just like us become more self-reliant. Sharing some of the little bit of extra we have been blessed with is a pleasure - we love how we can share and then re-share over and over again.
lender.occupational_info: We spend most of our time cleaning up after our children, looking for missing shoes and trying to ensure that homework gets done. We also love to go hiking in the woods and mountains. We enjoy our Sundays together and we are sad that our children are growing up so quickly.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I'm an independant businessman in Canada where it\'s pretty easy to get setup and apply for loans. I appreciate the freedom we have here and want to pass on some of that to others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a travel consulting business where I can supply airline tickets, trips, etc. to people from across the world. Part of the proceeds of my business are used to finance others through Kiva. Click on the link for more information.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Initiative needs to be supported...

lender.name: John and Margaret
lender.loan_because: It is a priveledge to help people who are trying so hard to improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Braxton Neate
lender.loan_because: The world needs more compassion! This is my small way of giving back to the world and helping those who are less fortunate reach their goals in life.

lender.name: GrumpyJay
lender.loan_because: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it. -Bob Hope

lender.name: spice of life
lender.occupation: i pamper people by cleaning their houses.
lender.loan_because: we have to much in this country, and don't appreciate it enough. i have been to guatemala, mexico and cuba and have seen what a little help can do to a family.

lender.name: I am Bidong
lender.loan_because: My family comes from a war torn third world country and it is nice to be able to provide some assistance to others in need by means of loans, not charity.
lender.occupational_info:
I work in marketing as my full time job -- I promote and sell a service.
My passion is photography. I'd love to hear what you think of some of my work.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I believe in a life of service to others and one way I can serve those less fortunate than I is to help them achieve their goals through financial assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student and plan on practicing medicine.

lender.name: Joseph and Amanda
lender.loan_because: Our awesome Uncle Gary gave us Kiva credit so we could help the world just a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: Joseph works in building models of ocean waves and dynamics. Amanda helps those in need in times of emergency.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It's a small act that can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to speak English.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I can..what a wonderful way to help someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: help people know about your product so you can sell more!

lender.name: deborah
lender.loan_because: i want other women to be able to support and further the educations of their children as I try to do the same for mine.
lender.occupational_info: i help heal and rehabilitate sick or injured people in order that they can regain their independence and sense of self-worth

lender.name: Darrel & Pam
lender.loan_because: I believe, given the opportunity, these entreprenuers can be successful. Successful small businesses are the foundation to any community and essential for the community to grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired commercial banker. During my working years I was involved in some micro-lending and found it to be very satisfying.

lender.name: Dennie
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people experience the love of God and share that love with others.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It feels great and it is such an empowering thing to be able to provide for yourself and for your family. So many people in America take that ability for granted. I want to help these people to better themselves, raise their qualities of life, and with their many blessings do the same for others in need.
lender.occupational_info: In Costa Rica I met a wonderful woman who said, \"The hands that give are always full.\" Since these treasures we have on earth won\'t last anyway, it makes all the more sense that I should give it away. Hopefully people will wonder why I would do this, why I would give to and love these people around the world. I would gladly say, \"because Jesus loved me first.\" Praise God. :) In my life I have been influenced greatly by Jesus, Paul the Apostle, Martin Luther King Jr., Victor Hugo, Henry David Thoreau, Jean-Jauques Rousseau, and a few others that slip my mind. I also sponsor a child in Rwanda and fight AIDS through an organization called Compassion International (www.compassion.com). I promote sustainable agriculture and fight hunger, while giving people to power to provide for themselves and their families through Heifer International (www.heifer.org). I also fight child abduction, the civil war in Uganda, and for civil liberties in Uganda through the Invisible Children organization (www.invisiblechildren.com). I also will be going on Christian missionary trips with my church. You should really check these out. The bottom line in everything is that we love everyone. We haven\'t the liberty to decide who we love, it must be everyone (Just like Jesus). Love, love, love, love, love!

lender.name: Justina
lender.loan_because: Donation only goes so far.
lender.occupational_info: I lend to people across the globe where credit and banks aren't an everyday thing as they are where I live. So, to increase circulation, I donate my money to people that will pay me back, and then re-dispersing that loan so more and more people can benefit from it!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I can. It's the right thing to do. I live in a country that uses far more than its share of the world's resources. We've amassed wealth beyond need or reason. It's our responsibility to share at least some of it. The people looking for small loans through Kiva are trying to do something about their economic position -- I have to help them.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to be able to help someone in a small way to improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I create flower gardens for home gardens and businesses.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a food store.

lender.name: wes and jeannette
lender.loan_because: To empower people and give them a helping hand. And then do it again and again.This in my opinion makes a large impact on peoples lives and is the best way I know of putting our money to use.
lender.occupational_info: I organize the the crews, equipment, and projects to serve our customers.

lender.name: ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have less than I do.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: My daughter knew of my interest in microloans and gave my wife and me each a gift certificate for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a physician in Hilliard, OH, since 1972, first in the ER and then as a family physician.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: I was a dentist for over 20 years, and now I am retired.

lender.name: papowitz sisters/mom
lender.loan_because: We hope our children (melindas son pictured) will grow up learning from these far away entrepreuners about how to make a go of it--even in difficult circumstances--and about how to help out if you can. Along these lines, we also dedicate our little fund to the memory of our immigrant grandparents.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I believe people need a hand more than they need a handout. Banks often lend money to people who already have it and not to those who need it. Doesn\'t make any sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m a reporter with CityNews in Toronto, a local tv station.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing my good fortune
lender.occupational_info: I work with internet based companies to improve their services.

lender.name: Adumasa
lender.loan_because: It is a way to make a direct impact in a persons life. Each of us can use a helping hand at some point in our lives.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: The concept of small person-to-person loans really appeals to us. Our daughter knew we liked this idea and found Kiva and gave us each a gift certificate for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired I was a secretary at The Ohio State University in the Department of Family Medicine, so I am interested in helping people in healthcare.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: It takes many people to help each.

lender.name: Husak
lender.loan_because: Years ago I was in the same situation back in my country of origin where there was no help available like this. Thank goodness for technology where you can help people directly without government interference and corruption. Keep up the good work.
lender.occupational_info: I drive a truck and service beverage machines for a cola company. I enjoy what I do for a living.

lender.name: Jen & Jane
lender.loan_because: We loan because it empowers people doing good work. It makes life better for kids and their parents...for the whole community...for generations.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I\'m a capitalist, and I believe that capitalism is the way to personal freedom. Kiva fosters capitalism because it allows people to be the best they can be by giving them financial independence, choices, and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I sell steel for a small, family-owned business to manusfacturing companies across the world, mostly in the U.S.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: This is the most direct and influential way to make a significant change in another persons life without physically being there
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories with pictures

lender.name: Reve and Susan
lender.loan_because: an important aspect of our life is to invest in the development of others
lender.occupational_info: We help people build and sustain powerful relationships in their business, community, and family.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I'd like to in a tiny way help others who did not have the luck I did to be born in a wealthy country
lender.occupational_info: I go into homes and small busnisses and help people whose computers are not working to make them work. Also wife and I are trainers for Center for Nonviolent Communication.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: There have been people in my life who have helped me when I didn't have any money. I would not have been able to go to school if others had not made loans to me. I want to help others the way I was helped and as a way of saying thank you to those that helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I study the history of people from all over the world by looking at their skeletons. I work with archaeologists and study the skeletons they find. I am trying to learn about what life was like for people in the past. I've also started studying the chemistry inside of the skeletons to see what the diets and health were like for these people.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I believe it is great to reward the working poor.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe in our world family and am so lucky to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a nurse for 48 years and I currently work teaching people how to be as healthy as they can.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others so they can help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that have experienced a disability or injury return to being independent in everyday life (provide physical rehabilitation to: get back to work, use a wheelchair, get dressed, feed themselves, etc.)

lender.name: edward
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good and besides i can
lender.occupational_info: as above

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching economics to college students.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because:
For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me. Matthew 25:35-36
Jesus Christ has saved my life and I desire to serve Him with all that I am.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: Gandhi said, "Be the change you wish to see in the world." With organizations such as Kiva, I believe this is possible.

lender.name: Oisin
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Cristiano and Kathryn
lender.loan_because: \"All the believers were one in heart and mind. No one claimed that any of his possessions was his own, but they shared everything they had... There were no needy persons among them. For from time to time those who owned lands or houses sold them, brought the money from the sales and put it at the apostles\' feet, and it was distributed to anyone as he had need.\"
lender.occupational_info: Cristiano is a manager at a large bank in Canada, helping people make good borrowing and investment decisions. Kathryn is an artist and mom-at-home taking care of baby Elena. We also own some rental properties, but we would ultimately like to move to a country like Mozambique to help or found a micro-finance organization.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a lower-middle class household by American standards, which is to say I am a very lucky person. I\'ve managed to carve out a decent life for myself, and while I work a low-income job and live a modest life, I have enough. And with the little extra I do have I can think of no more noble cause than helping to provide someone else with the opportunity to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Brazosport College in Lake Jackson, Texas. I also have a full time job at a local hotel as a front desk associate.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: They best way to change the world is from the bottom up (economically speaking). That is exactly what Kiva does, and it does it better than any other nonprofit organization in the entire world.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a means to a greater end. Kiva is a part of that end.

lender.name: Kaley
lender.loan_because: I think this site is really neat.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a high school.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: there are good people all over the world if given a chance will do great things for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach distance learning sociology.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I do it because even in these tough times, I still find the need to help.
lender.occupational_info: We construct sustainable solutions and service.

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance
lender.occupational_info: Investigating new services put in place by Telecom companies

lender.name: Cleo
lender.loan_because: I needed something to do when I'm not sleeping, eating, or grooming myself.
lender.occupational_info: By wrapping my paws around my owner's neck and purring while lying on her chest, I am able to ensure she falls asleep in a timely manner each night.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: The world gives to me so I give back to the world.

lender.name: TribUrbana
lender.loan_because: we believe it is a great way to empower and encourage others and to fight against the evil and injustice of poverty!
lender.occupational_info: We are a community of people in the heart of Seville, Spain seeking to live as Jesus demonstrated: with Love.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: public radio broadcaster; microfinance volunteer

lender.name: Bruce & Family
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to help others help themselves and make the world a more tolerant and peaceful place. By being happy and cheerful and helping others we can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental engineer planning international development projects gearing them to be more sustainable and in harmony with the environment and social/cultural setting. My wife is a school teacher and my two sons are currently in University.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe microloans are the best way to combat poverty in the world to date.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist. I paint mostly wildlife.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have the spare change and its no risk.... why not help someone?

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: it helps me build connections with people in other places. I love the fact that I can recycle the same money so that it can be used by more and more people. The returns on my Kiva portfolio have easily outstripped returns on other investments.
lender.occupational_info: I sell antique bird and animal prints. The prints provide a wonderful connection to the past, and help people understand how our relationship to nature has changed over time.

lender.name: taylor
lender.loan_because: she is trying to help her family.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in the past so I understand the difference a little help can make in someones life. At the end of the day it just makes me feel good.

lender.name: Gosikh
lender.loan_because: I can help someone else start a business.

lender.name: Carlo
lender.loan_because: I loan to add to the beauty that surrounds me.
lender.occupational_info: I am gainfully unemployed.

lender.name: Trillium
lender.loan_because: I would love to help

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupation: Teacher and Stay at home Mom
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me one year a gift certificate for Kiva. He knew that my husband and I had gotten to the point that we felt that there was too much commercialization in our Christmas gift giving. This was his response to that which we were thrilled to be a part of.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days right now raising my two kids. I have stopped my career and have committed myself to our family. Getting them ready for school, taking them to school, volunteering at their schools, helping them at home with projects and homework and making sure they are healthy and stimulated takes up most of my time. I do however spend time reading, cooking, discussing parenting, and keeping myself informed on issues that are important to me.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: A memorial on behalf of Oscar, who passed away in 2006 from cancer.

lender.name: Dr. Bill
lender.loan_because: I hope by being involved in microfinance I can do my little part to help enrich the lives of at least a few people in underdeveloped countries.
lender.occupational_info: I teach about natural resources, the enviornment, and conservation to college students.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make a big difference in someone else\'s life.

lender.name: Gerry
lender.loan_because: to encourage entrepreneurship with small steps at first.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Loan Officer and regional director

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: It can change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach conversational English to adults and children in Taiwan.

lender.name: Jacalyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help folks who are in need and want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga to adults in New York City and in Japan. I also train yoga teachers

lender.name: dilan
lender.loan_because: My aunt and uncle gave me money to donate as part of my christmas gifts so i can learn how to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Red Hen Baking Co.
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: A wholesale bread bakery, baking and delivering certified organic bread everyday of the year!

lender.name: Sina Motamedi
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to provide the opportunity for enthusiastic entrepreneurs to control their own futures through business. I love the idea of empowering individuals who are striving to lift themselves up through economic prosperity.

lender.name: Tashi
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: My wife and I both served in the Peace Corps in Honduras. We both understand the power even a small loan can have on someone's life and business in a developing country. We both feel that it is important to support these efforts at international development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college professor and teach geology and geography at a community college.

lender.name: Frazier
lender.loan_because: In people I trust.

lender.name: 5 Friends
lender.loan_because: We've experienced adversity in our lives and we know what it is to receive a helping hand.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I'm lending to help make one person's life better and their communities more prosperous. I lend because it makes me feel great.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver computer services to my customers helping them achieve their business goals

lender.name: Peter & Melinda
lender.loan_because: We have seen, heard and experienced a great deal about the success and personal satisfaction of micro-financing. One of the most enjoyable aspects of our world travel has been witnessing and being a part of many inspiring service projects.
lender.occupational_info: We help produce Love, Intimacy and Sexuality workshops with the Human Awareness Institute. Those workshops help people to communicate more clearly and with more heart. We also create many community events for that organization as well as work with schools to foster the emotional and social health of students through an organization called Challenge Day.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: I travel quite a bit in the developing world and some of our business takes place there. It\'s nice to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an adventure travel company, developing new trips and managing the marketing department.

lender.name: AJL
lender.loan_because: Fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Jeniese
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: It is amazing what North Americans take for granted. I want to be part of making a difference for those who do not have the ready resources we do.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful use of the internet! It's so simple to help someone who has a great plan to improve their circumstances but needs the help with the cash flow. Brilliant!

lender.name: Jane in Phoenix
lender.loan_because: It gives me goosebumps to see what people can do to change their lives when they follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I practiced law for 20 years and made a lot of money. Now I follow what my heart tells me to do. I wish I always "got that." Now I help local Arizona artisans by providing a space where we sell their work in Central Phoenix.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I make animations for TV networks, commercials, documentaries and short films. I also take pictures of birds and other wildlife.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical researcher and physician-in-training interested in the treatment of cancer.

lender.name: patti
lender.loan_because: I believe we are here on this earth to help each other.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of the entrepreneur and realize how difficult it is to find someone who believes in you and your business plan.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to business people that specialize in fixing houses and selling them for profit in a short period of time.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.occupational_info: Musical and spiritual wondering ambassador.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to create a self sufficient life for themselves. Governments only take care of corporations, so it is up to the people to take care of the people.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a commercial AAA community radio station.

lender.name: Joe & Christy
lender.occupation: IT Professional and parents of four
lender.loan_because: after we watched a documentary on micro-lending in Bangladesh we just knew it was something we wanted to be involved in.

lender.name: Lisa & Daniel
lender.loan_because: We want to help.
lender.occupational_info: We are problem solvers.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sharen and Trevor
lender.loan_because: It is important that everyone have a chance to improve their lives and the places where they live. Sustainability starts with individual commitment.
lender.occupational_info: Sharen helps communities build parks and neighborhoods while protecting the environment. Trevor sells meat to restaurants. We both love to grow vegetables, cook, and be outdoors.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I believe that it\'s a great cause and it makes a difference in people\'s lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help to produce the 6 o\'clock television newscast everyday.

lender.name: Tod
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people better themselves in any way possible.
lender.occupational_info: I create the graphics (images) for businesses. The logo, the advertising, the website, etc.

lender.name: patricia w
lender.loan_because: Working is better than worrying!

lender.name: Lise
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good about helping somebody to succeed

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: It feels great, to be able to helpout a small business person achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a museum.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: People have helped me in the past.
lender.occupational_info: I preserve the history and culture of computer and other digital games.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Sometimes hard work is not enough, a helping hand can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: Retired commercial fisherman.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: growing plants

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I think I can really make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I don\'t have a job or go to work. I am a High School Freshmen. I play basketball, volleyball, and track & field. For fun at home I read and hang out with my family.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am helping to eliminate poverty one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info:
Environmental Biology Graduate.
I intend to help reduce the ecological footprints and corresponding financial costs of institutions in both the public and private sector.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in "us" and "them". We are all one.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work at my College serving food and drinks to my fellow students

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I work on US foreign policy.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: We all need to be responsible for the world we live in and one way is to help others who are not as fortunate as ourselves. Lets make the world a beautiful place.

lender.name: Paul & Susan
lender.loan_because: Isaiah 58:7-9 Is it not to share your food with the hungry and to provide the poor wanderer with shelter-when you see the naked, to clothe him,and not to turn away from your own flesh and blood? Then your light will break forth like the dawn, and your healing will quickly appear; then your righteousness will go before you, and the glory of the LORD will be your rear guard. Then you will call, and the LORD will answer; you will cry for help, and he will say: Here am I.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: i am able to.
lender.occupational_info: i spend much of my time making a happy home for my husband and daughter. my other time is spent working for my church volunteering -- whether at the food pantry or publicizing upcoming events.

lender.name: Mike & Beth
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate to have professional opportunities and we'd like to help provide opportunities to others.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: It Does Make A Difference
lender.occupational_info: I get to meet and talk to people from all over the world.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: we are all in this world together.
lender.occupational_info: The loans I choose are based on women who are involved in small-scale farming, restaurant or food production. In my career, I help communities and companies manage garbage and recyclables and solve water quality problems.

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I may not be able to do much but that doesn\'t mean I can\'t do something. Besides, knowing you helped in some small way to make a difference in someone\'s life - that\'s awesome.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: Capital matters.
lender.occupational_info: I help run Somaliland's first law firm, Watershed Legal Services.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I used to travel, and met many people who had been poor as we once were. People who rise out of poverty do it in only one way- a plan, a bit of help, and working very hard. My parents did that with a $400 loan, my husband and I did that with $1,000, and I want to pass along that little bit of help. I cannot give you a good plan, nor can I do the hard work, but I can give a little help to make life better.
lender.occupational_info: I used to travel all over the world showing people how to use computers to make money. I was hurt in an accident and now I am at home. Now, I make beaded bracelets to give to people who need a smile, over 2,500 so far. I write stories and make beaded sculptures of increasing complexity.

lender.name: carly
lender.loan_because: To support crafty woman everywhere.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I have a business of my own and I know how difficult it is to get a loan.
lender.occupational_info: Typesetting, graphics, multimedia, web design.

lender.name: louise
lender.loan_because: I would like to support people to make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in mental health - the aim of the organisation I work for is to reduce the stigma for people with mental illness and to promote the principles of normalisation and integration.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is a small way for me to give back to others less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician. I spend my days trying to relieve suffering and pain and restore people to health.

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I like to see entrepreneurs suceed.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a marketing manager for a large global technical company

lender.name: just me
lender.loan_because: Out of habit, I used to buy cups of coffee I never really wanted, magazines I never read, and I paid for cable tv movies I never got a chance to watch. Now I forgo these things that I did not use/need and instead put some of that money to a much better use - helping people start or expand their business in hopes of covering basic expenses like putting food on the table and paying their childrens school fees. When you put it in perspective, its a pretty easy change to make in my everyday life as it has has few consequences for me, but huge rewards for the people who receive these loans.

lender.name: Stella Dot
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can/should/want to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just working on talking

lender.name: Jennie, Mike & Wendy
lender.loan_because: it is a small, tangible thing my family can do to help fight poverty- as well as support the dreams of our brothers and sisters in the world.

lender.name: Luis & Chantel
lender.loan_because: I saw coverage of Kiva on tv and thought that it was a great program to get involved with. Looking forward to continue lending.
lender.occupational_info: Military Engineer

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Buy low sell high.

lender.name: Norma and Robert
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Inger Klekacz
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to do great things in the service of others.
lender.occupational_info: I make photographs. Of everything and everyone. I love it.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people
lender.occupational_info: Executive Management

lender.name: Agnes
lender.loan_because: for selfish reasons in that it makes me feel good to know I can help someone across the world in a small way. I want to show my daughter how important it is to help others when possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying labor relations so workers in the United States can feel safe again to live.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I measure things that our company makes to make sure they fit together properly.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I started my own business several years ago, and I know how difficult it is to get operating capital. I want to give back to others to help them start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional educator. I provide training and coaching services to educators, teachers and administrators to help them improve their schools and school systems.

lender.name: sarah Blackmore
lender.loan_because: my husband too is an entrepreneur.

lender.name: MaggiesDad
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps make Maggie's world a better place!

lender.name: ron @ carole
lender.loan_because: a grain of rice will soon become a bag with a little help from our friends

lender.name: James McBride
lender.loan_because: I believe in the philosophy of microcredit. It can be way to tap into market forces in order to alleviate inequality, increase economic independence, and provide opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I cook traditional italian pizza in New York City.

lender.name: www.cardsforkiva.com
lender.loan_because: It is a sustainable way to restore impoverished communities by enabling individuals and families to do it themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Cards for Kiva is owned and operated by Jessica Tankersley and Kara Blain in Tulsa, OK. We make and sell handmade greeting cards and then loan 100% of our profits through kiva.org.

lender.name: deny david
lender.loan_because: hola soy un chico que tengo deseo de seguir adelante

lender.name: D. Fauser
lender.loan_because: I love to see people who are ambitious and who want to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I'm Teaching Men (and women) to Fish!!

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I feel that people need to help other people in any way possible as we are all in this life together.
lender.occupational_info: I was a computer programmer for the State of Ca for 22 years, now retired. I currently sell antique jewelry on the internet.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be self-sufficient

lender.name: Matt & Kate
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to encourage others to succeed in the goals they set for themselves. Having both worked at independently owned business in our small town, we believe that small businesses are the heart and soul of a community.
lender.occupational_info: We teach English literature and composition at the same local high school (grades 9-12, ages 14-18).

lender.name: Norm
lender.loan_because: Helping people through Kiva is much more personal and satisfying to me than the type of bank lending I have done for the last 35 years.
lender.occupational_info: I help make decisions on whether my bank should make loans to businesses. Often, the loans are very large.

lender.name: Henny
lender.loan_because: because it helps.
lender.occupational_info: doctor for backs and joints

lender.name: Grossman-Naples Family
lender.loan_because: Our family is grateful for what we have and we want to help others along the way. Ari, Melissa, Doron, Rafi, Zohara, And Ziva.

lender.name: katharine
lender.loan_because: I love the personal stories and helping women to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I organize volunteers to do work for the non-profit I work for.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: If we truly are a global village, then these are my neighbours. My grandma taught me to share ~ and a wonderful friend showed me a way to do that using Kiva
lender.occupational_info: I interview people about events that they have participated in or have been witness to; these interviews allow us to preserve our history in many different forms ~ from books to archives.

lender.name: Ashlyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone has unlimited potential. Watching the impact of what we can do as a community gives me hope and confidence for the future.
lender.occupational_info: I help communities find ways to ensure everyone is fed, housed, educated and safe.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Others need help.
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to not work. I'd rather be cycling or traveling.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want some of my money to work for those in need and not just me.
lender.occupational_info: I write documents to help a computer company sell its services.

lender.name: J
lender.loan_because: I think I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I deal in knowledge management. Sharing helps everyone prosper.

lender.name: Erick
lender.loan_because: It's a small world.
lender.occupational_info: My professional occupation is Architecture - dedicate to healing, learning and discovery (healthcare, academic and research facilities). Architecture inspires me because it is an expression of utility and delight with the potential to move people, improve their lives and transpire them to a higher level of consciousness. I am fortunate to be involved with hospital projects, creating a place of comfort for patients and family members in their most profound moments.

lender.name: Barbra
lender.loan_because: It's a fast and easy way to make a difference.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: After a vacation with my family to Mexico, I realized how poor the country was and thought I would like to help out the people. I also really liked their crafts. I also liked to help out people that sell things in markets ESPECIALLY fish because I love fish so much!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Kylie, Dascha and Dima
lender.loan_because: I think that the possibility of meaningful and enriching employment is critical to social change. Hopefully my loans will enrich the lives of those who receive the funds, and promote sustainable growth in areas that otherwise would be prone to exploitation by neo-cons and international conglomerates.
lender.occupational_info: I work everyday to help and protect some of the most vulnerable members of my community: domestic animals and low-to-zero-income people who don\'t have the resources to properly care for their pets. I love working creatively to improve the quality of life for abused, neglected and abandoned animals, as well as bringing to justice those that willfully harm animals. In my spare time I garden organically...I hope to see the opportunity to loan to international farmers looking to explore organic and perma-culture agriculture! \r\n

lender.name: Iris and Grand Daughter
lender.loan_because: We're paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Family practice doctor.

lender.name: Micky
lender.loan_because: I feel it is what my Christian faith compels me to do out of love for others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Judge as a Court at Law Administrator. I set the court dockets and basically make sure that the Judge, the attorneys and the parties all show up on the same date at the same time.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I hope it will make a difference in the lives of people I will probably never meet.
lender.occupational_info: I design electric power distribution lines for an electric power company.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: The best way to help others is to help them to help themselves, and loaning money through KIVA seems to be the next best thing to teaching!

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I attend the University of California, Berkeley.

lender.name: David Fraga
lender.loan_because: The market is the most efficient way to sustainably improve the lives of the working poor. Societal wealth venturing creates a virtuous cycle of sustainable profits, employment, economic growth, and increased government resources through increased taxable income. Rather than aid, which treats symptoms instead of problems and thus must be given again and again, the same money loaned on sites like Kiva can be reinvested indefinitely. Furthermore, each time it is invested, it can have a long-lasting and transformative impact on entrepreneurs and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Shutterstock, a digital stock photography company that provides high quality photos to creative professionals around the world. I am also the Co-Founder LendforPeace.org, a microfinance platform similar to Kiva that focuses on the Middle East.

lender.name: Eduard and Luis Lopez
lender.loan_because: We enjoy being a part of helping people transform their lives through business.
lender.occupational_info: Father and son in different businesses but we are primarily focused on sales, marketing, and entrepreneurship.

lender.name: chrishon
lender.loan_because: i know what its like to need help and was fortunate enough to get it, now its my turn
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories

lender.name: Mae
lender.loan_because: I believe anything is possible and people should have dreams and opportunities. It\'s better in life to have tried and NOT have tried. By the way, I have sponsored a girl from Kenya, Africa with World Vision Canada for the past 6 years and I pay $372 Cdn per year. So $25 US is a small amount but, when others give the total amount is significant to the borrower.

lender.name: Monica Moody
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who are helping themselves, providing for their families, growing business and cultivating communities.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to design everything from signs and billboards to web sites to items that are printed on paper (like brochures, menus, flyers, postcards, and more.)

lender.name: Kids of Rich and Bekki
lender.loan_because: Our new holiday family tradition is to pool our money and instead of purchasing gifts for each other, we loan the money to a new business. We love the positive change that Kiva encourages, and it is such a blessing to empower others to succeed in their own endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group a brothers and sisters, all of different trades...

lender.name: Karon
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Asawari
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to try and better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege of helping select the amazing MFIs that Kiva partners with in various countries.

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: i got a gift certificate from a friend

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: A small amount can give someone that first foot they need on the ladder of economic development.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to those wanting to build infrastructure in developing countries in SE Asia such as power stations, roads, ports and airports.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Jessica Flannery is my hero. For those of you who don't know, Jessica and her husband Matt are the co-founders of Kiva. As Biggie Smalls once said, if you don't know, now you know...
lender.occupational_info: I'm at Stanford Graduate Business School right now... but I've gotta go out and get a real job by June. Yikes!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I feel that I can make a positive direct impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a public radio and TV station in Upstate New York.

lender.name: Einar
lender.loan_because: every little bit can help

lender.name: Edith
lender.loan_because: I believe it is so important that people have basic economic opportunities to better their own lives and the lives of their families, and I love the idea that I as an individual can help other individuals across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a treasure hunter for information

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I'm able to!

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: it gives me the chance to make a difference that really matters.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for almost 30 years. I teach about social justice issues at the university.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: The banks will not.
lender.occupational_info: Financial Plans for attaining various goals

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: the happier each person is...the happier the entire world will be.
lender.occupational_info: I give people financial hope and I let them know that everything will be alright when everything seems to be going completely wrong. I make sure that they know they haven't failed...they're still good people...they just need to be redirected and regain their focus so that they can live calmly once again...peacefully and happily.
